ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: I have dual ykeshas... my friends got them for me after i helped them camp the lord for at least 3 sets of the things. a lvl 45+ bard makes the lord room easy,
ygData.messageBody:
I have dual ykeshas... my friends got them for me after i helped them camp
the lord for at least 3 sets of the things. a lvl 45+ bard makes the lord
room easy, I just lull the two guards and pull the lord. Then wait awhile.
Then lull one guard and pull the other. Then wait some more, and then go
kill the last guard and camp the room. Lull failed? Thats ok, you can send
at least one of the guards off chasing pixies while the group kills the
lord. So yes, you usually have to pass on the ykeshas till everybody else
has one, but doing the lord room is nothing special for a bard, and all lvl
45+ bards should have them (they dont have to use them, they should just
have them :).

Not to mention the lord room gives some great experiance. Better than the
lava crawlers, kobolds, or any other place i can find for a lvl 47+
individual.

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 40 Necromancer
Tunare

At 10:52 AM 10/13/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
>>LOL - you really meant 45-50th bard for those items?
>>Those items fall within those level ranges and are very
>>acquireable by a NON-TWINKED bard at lvl 40+.
>
>You are absoutely right. I was in the Lord's room and
>Frenzied room just the other night. Here's what I mean:
>
>/g SWORD! He's got the sword.
>
>[insert battle here]
>
>/g Wooohoo!!!
>/shout YKESHA!
>
>Party says 'Who gets it? Someone who can use it. No casters
> and the bard doesn't need it. Here Warrior.'
>
>---
>
>Who in their right mind is gonna give a bard a Ykesha or fbbs?
>Twinked: someone handed those items to the person through guild
>connections. Plus going on their knowledge alone, I would say
>they didnt earn them (or someone bought an Ebay account, muhaha)
>
>Sorry for the confusion. =)
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
>the subject lol.
